overview:
Tod Whipple is a serial entrepreneur, technology geek and real estate developer in the New England area. Tod is the founder of StartupAddict.com a funding platform for startups and entrepreneurs. You will find Tod at Startup Addict Musings where he is an avid blogger discussing topics concerning startups, technology and business.

In a former life, Mr. Whipple produced feature films, television and new media projects. He was a partner at Scout Productions a film/television and new media production company in Boston Massachusetts. He started the company’s new media division in 2000. Some of his credits include Queer Eye for the Straight Guy for Bravo/NBC, Session 9 for USA Films, and Deadmanâ€™s Curve for Trimark pictures.

Presently, Tod is involved in a number of businesses, enjoys blogging and crafting new business models.
